title: Website Development Skills
description: As a web developer in Philippines, I build clear and useful websites with strong coding skills. I work with PHP, Laravel, and JavaScript to create smooth and reliable systems. I make sure every project is simple to use and ready for real business needs.

title: Frontend Design Skills
description: As one of the website developers Philippines, I enjoy working on the look and feel of each page. I use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue, and WordPress Elementor Pro to create clean layouts that are easy for people to explore.

title: Virtual Assistant Skills
description: As a Philippines web designer who also supports clients, I help with content creation, data research, language tasks, and simple daily actions. This makes work easier, faster, and more organized for the people I assist.
